cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 19th Oct 2025 (AEDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 19th Oct 2025 (AEDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: Standard 8 Bed Female Dorm
dorms.description: Female dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer female accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Our shared bunkrooms have high quality mattresses, crisp cotton sheets, woollen donnas and blankets, free wifi, and a lamp, powerpoint and shelf per person.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Twin Room Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.

privates.labelDescription: Our private double rooms have high quality mattresses, crisp cotton sheets, woollen donnas and blankets, and free wifi.
